deity_markdown: [Angradd](/Deities.aspx?ID=444), [Chavazvug](/Deities.aspx?ID=582), [Chohar](/Deities.aspx?ID=675), [Dahak](/Deities.aspx?ID=337), [Lady Nanbyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=311), [Light Of The Everlasting Flame](/Deities.aspx?ID=369), [Mahja Firehair](/Deities.aspx?ID=557), [Moloch](/Deities.aspx?ID=401), [Nephthys](/Deities.aspx?ID=637), [Nurgal](/Deities.aspx?ID=433), [Ra](/Deities.aspx?ID=521), [Rovagug](/Deities.aspx?ID=291), [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=292), [Szuriel](/Deities.aspx?ID=392), [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=683), [Ymeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=697), [Zelishkar](/Deities.aspx?ID=424), [Zursvaater](/Deities.aspx?ID=501)
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Burning Hands](/Spells.aspx?ID=30)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 322 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Bloodlines**
[Elemental](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=6), [Phoenix](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=15)

**Deities**
[Angradd](/Deities.aspx?ID=444), [Chavazvug](/Deities.aspx?ID=582), [Chohar](/Deities.aspx?ID=675), [Dahak](/Deities.aspx?ID=337), [Lady Nanbyo](/Deities.aspx?ID=311), [Light Of The Everlasting Flame](/Deities.aspx?ID=369), [Mahja Firehair](/Deities.aspx?ID=557), [Moloch](/Deities.aspx?ID=401), [Nephthys](/Deities.aspx?ID=637), [Nurgal](/Deities.aspx?ID=433), [Ra](/Deities.aspx?ID=521), [Rovagug](/Deities.aspx?ID=291), [Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=292), [Szuriel](/Deities.aspx?ID=392), [Walkena](/Deities.aspx?ID=683), [Ymeri](/Deities.aspx?ID=697), [Zelishkar](/Deities.aspx?ID=424), [Zursvaater](/Deities.aspx?ID=501)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 15-foot cone

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** 
[basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex

</row>

</column>

---

Gouts of flame rush from your hands. You deal 2d6 fire damage to creatures in the area.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 2d6.
name: Burning Hands
